channel.title: 459 - Ruix - VPS - Skillcape emotes - All skills - Construction - Ruix - 459
channel.description:
Hello everyone.
Ruix is based off of PJA Hyperion, originally made by the whole PJA team (Brian, Ryan, Tom, Keegan, etc). Most of the credits go to them. But, I am to modify it immensely, fixing all of its glitches and maps, adding other things like more random events, finishing construction, perfecting skills that dont work to the full like firemaking, etc.
This is my log as of now, for now its going to be empty pretty much. I am going to log things from what I did today though:
5/5/2010
Fixed random events.
[ul][li]Mysterious old man.[/li] [li]Ghost.[/li] [li]Santa.[/li] [li]Evil chicken.[/li] [li]Easter bunny.[/li] [li]Tree spirit.[/li] [li]Troll.[/li] [li]Golem.[/li][/ul]
Made the teleport IMB (Illegal Monk Brother). Finished Jad (now there's 40 waves). Put some timers together so there isn't too much lag while doing PC. Fixed "Ship couldn't start, ship null" problem. Edited shop item prices. Fixed rock crabs.
[ul][li]Changes to a rock when no players are by it.[/li] [li]Changes to an NPC when a player is by it.[/li][/ul]
5/4/2010
Added a butler to construction. Added staircases. Fixed planting trees, and put in appropriate gfx. Old man random event. Fixed santa event. Ghost event. Easter bunny event. Jesus event (A new NPC model added for this). 80% farming (only a couple places work, making all places work soon.)
Thats for today, and now here are pictures which are worth a hundred words, I guess.
[center] [img]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Advertisement/BarrageNEmote.png[/img]
[img]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Advertisement/Login.png[/img]
[img]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Advertisement/Shops.png[/img]
[img]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Advertisement/Wearing.png[/img]
[img]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Advertisement/Skills.png[/img]
[img]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Advertisement/SystemInfo.png[/img] [/center]
Joining application/ways to join:
Application - Name: Experience with 459s: Why I should pick you: Age: Email:
Ways to join - PM me the application. Reply to this thread using the application. Add my MSN at [email]stolarz@live.com[/email].
[center][img]http://i841.photobucket.com/albums/zz334/CoderNexus/Advertisement/Join.png[/img][/center][/list]

item.title: 459 - Ruix - VPS - Skillcape emotes - All skills - Construction - Ruix - 459
item.dc:creator: @Mod_Whip Mod Whip
item.description:
@Mod_Whip wrote:

awesome looking server. And for the RAM of the vps… It doesn’t honestly matter that much. I ran a server with 25-30 people on at any given time on my old pc with 512mb ram, and it didn’t lag really much at all. obviously I could hold more if I had more RAM, but the server only had 6500 accounts made, and it started to die down.

Read full topic

item.title: 459 - Ruix - VPS - Skillcape emotes - All skills - Construction - Ruix - 459
item.dc:creator: @Nexus1 Nexus_
item.description:
@Nexus1 wrote:

[quote=“marcbob, post:36, topic:338940”][quote author=Nexus_ link=topic=435325.msg3198789#msg3198789 date=1273095945]

Ok i just saw you posted on my topic i leeched pja but look at urself. YOU DID THE SAME THING MR. I LIKE TO USE CAPS AND BOLD. GO LEARN TO CODE FUCKING ASSHOLE

Hey fucking smart shit, lets get some things straight:

  1. Where’s the bold? “I LIKE TO USE CAPS AND BOLD.”
  2. I fixed a billion glitches, almost finished construction, added shops, made fight pits, added timers, remade pest control (because of its timers), etc. Ask Brian or Ryan how much i’ve worked on it.
  3. What the fuck did you do?

Oh, you did do something. You did file/search/replace/project anihilation -> gay shit. I forgot you changed the name, my bad.

Oh, and don’t rep-- me, there’s no point of doing that, you know.
[/quote]

Sounds like ive done just as much work as you have…[/quote]
I lol’d when I saw this.

Back on topic por favor ;D

Read full topic
